name: gpt-rag-ingestion (Azure)
description: [项目级] The GPT-RAG Data Ingestion service automates processing of diverse documents—PDFs, images, spreadsheets, transcripts, and SharePoint—readying them for Azure AI Search. It applies smart chunking, generates text and image embeddings, and enables rich, multimodal retrieval.。来源: https://github.com/Azure/gpt-rag-ingestion

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
The GPT-RAG Data Ingestion service automates processing of diverse documents—PDFs, images, spreadsheets, transcripts, and SharePoint—readying them for Azure AI Search. It applies smart chunking, generates text and image embeddings, and enables rich, multimodal retrieval.

来源: https://github.com/Azure/gpt-rag-ingestion
语言: Python
Stars: 164
